author: Luc Olinga
title: A Viral Question Is Puzzling Bitcoin Fans: Why Isn’t the Price Rising?
description: Corporations are buying billions, but the price is stuck. The answer reveals what Bitcoin has actually become.
content:
A question is going viral on social media, reflecting the confusion shared by Bitcoin skeptics and believers alike.
“Can anyone explain to me why companies are buying billions of dollars of Bitcoin … [+5141 chars]
reworded_title: Why Isn't Bitcoin's Price Increasing? A Viral Question on Every Crypto Enthusiast's Mind.
reworded_description: Despite corporations investing billions, the stagnant price suggests a new function of Bitcoin.
reworded_content: A trending inquiry on social media platforms embodies the shared uncertainty of both Bitcoin sceptics and proponents. "Is there someone who can clarify why corporations are investing billions of dollars in Bitcoin..." [+5141 chars]
